item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Songs from Avril Lavigne & Bat for Lashes
item.description:
Hi !

I'm looking for songs by Bat for Lashes & Avril Lavigne in any lossless format, please.


AVRIL LAVIGNE


Best Years Of Our Lives (ft. Avril Lavigne) by Evan T.
1 - Best Years Of Our Lives (ft. Avril Lavigne)

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/best-years-of-our-lives-ft-avril-lavigne-evan-t/0881034917829
_______________________________________________

Instant Karma: The Amnesty International Campaign To Save Darfur (Standard Version)
10 - Imagine (Album Version) - Avril Lavigne

https://www.deezer.com/en/track/791884?deferredFl=1
https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/i...ational-campaign-to-save-darfur/0093624997146
_______________________________________________

The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie-Music From The Movie and More
1 - SpongeBob SquarePants Theme (Album Version) - Avril Lavigne

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/t...-movie-and-more-various-artists/0093624888864
_______________________________________________

Ambitions (Japanese Version) by ONE OK ROCK
10 - Listen (featuring Avril Lavigne)


https://music.apple.com/jp/album/ambitions/1173406686?l=en
https://mora.jp/package/43000026/4562256124221/
_______________________________________________
_______________________________________________

BAT FOR LASHES


The Haunted Man (Deluxe Edition)
12 - Lumen
13 - Daphne
14 - A Wall (Other Nature Remix)
15 - All Your Gold (Hercules & Love Affair)
16 - All Your Gold (Nôze remix)

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/the-haunted-man-bat-for-lashes/5099901917758
https://tidal.com/browse/album/38648615
_______________________________________________

A Forest (Perfect As Cats Version)
1 - A Forest (Perfect As Cats Version)

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/a-forest-bat-for-lashes/jig8l10jt134a
https://tidal.com/browse/album/192923828
_______________________________________________

3 Song EP
1 - Strangelove (U.S. Mix)
2 - A Forest (Dub Mix)
3 - Horse and I (Live in London 2009)

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/3-song-ep-bat-for-lashes/jr0thhmm82y3a
https://tidal.com/browse/album/268146983
_______________________________________________

We've Only Just Begun
1 - We've Only Just Begun

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/weve-only-just-begun-bat-for-lashes/sj0w3b6hxq7nb
_______________________________________________

Daniel (Remixes)
1 - Daniel (Death Metal Disco Scene Remix)
2 - Daniel (Duke Dumont Remix)
3 - A Forest

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/daniel-bat-for-lashes/5099996552957
https://tidal.com/browse/album/243615782
_______________________________________________

Desert Man (Piano Version)
1 - Desert Man (Piano Version)

https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/desert-man-bat-for-lashes/ca66arktin5ka
https://tidal.com/browse/album/243614578
_______________________________________________

A Wall
1 - A Wall (Alt Mix)
2 - A Wall (Other Nature Remix)

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/a-wall-bat-for-lashes/5099993498654
https://tidal.com/browse/album/44808803
https://tidal.com/browse/album/18981912
_______________________________________________

Near
1 - Near

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/near-the-album-leaf-and-bat-for-lashes/hkmhv6qrad1sb
https://tidal.com/browse/album/267907331
_______________________________________________

Let's Get Lost by Beck and Bat For Lashes
1- Let's Get Lost

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/lets-get-lost-beck-and-bat-for-lashes/5099972375259
https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/t...ilight-saga-eclipse-2010-deluxe/0075679975058
https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/t...-the-twilight-saga-eclipse-2010/0075679977922

_______________________________________________

Thanks in advance for your help
